Blacks, Presidential Politics and Public Policy Conference (Howard University, Washington, DC)
Blacks, Presidential Politics and Public Policy Conference (Howard University, Washington, DC)

Cassette 3039-3040: Includes Discussion on the Criminal Justice System. Cassette 3041: Includes Affirmative Action. Cassette 3042: Includes Mainstream Democratic and Republican Roundtable (Chair, Dr. Vernon Gray). Cassette 3043: Includes U.S. Foreign Policy. Cassette 3044: Includes Louis Martin, Closing Address and U.S. Representative John Conyers.
